message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I think it's a great deal for you, as I know it would be valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm looking to save some money here.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. How about $82?
